alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Southwestern St. Tammany; Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:32PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern St. Tammany, southeastern Tangipahoa and south central Washington Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 332 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Folsom to near Covington. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Abita Springs, Folsom and Enon. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 56 and 64. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Southwestern St. Tammany; Washington
